alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:57AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kenedy, north central Cameron and central Willacy Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arroyo City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Rio Hondo, Arroyo City, Port Mansfield, Texas State Technical College Harlingen, Harlingen Arts And Heritage Museum, Port Mansfield Airport, Harlingen Soccer Complex, Lozano and Willamar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy
